---
title: "Chapter 2. Importing data for the first time"
format: html
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(dspatterns)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
stickers_empty <- read_excel("stickers.xlsx", n_max = 0)
```


```{r, paged.print=FALSE}
stickers_empty <- 
  stickers_empty %>%
  rename(stickers_given = 12) %>%
  clean_names()
```


```{r}
col_names_vec <- names(stickers_empty) 
```


```{r, paged.print=FALSE}
stickers <- read_excel("stickers.xlsx", skip = 2, col_names = col_names_vec)
```


```{r, paged.print=FALSE}
stickers <-
  stickers %>%
  rename(percent_given = ends_with("100percent"))

stickers
```
